name: Big Cliff Long Fall
description: Bring the climber his lost rope so we can continue up the great lift!

name: Icy Cliff No Grip
description: Bring the climber spikes so he can continue up the frozen mountainside!

name: Dark Cave Need Lights
description: Bring the climber a light source so he can continue downward into the depths

name: Unusual Behavior
description: The invading gnolls have acquired the power to wield dark magic! find the sorcorer and slay them!

name: Emergency Report
description: Find commander Hothorn at the Canyons outpost and warn him of the gnolls plans.
